alert.note: Alert for Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 01 at 2:33PM EDT until August 01 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Michigan, including the following county, Tuscola. * WHEN...Until 530 PM EDT. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 233 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Caro, Vassar, Cass City, Reese, Akron, Fairgrove, Kingston, Quanicassee, Ellington, Wilmot, Gilford, Watrousville, East Dayton, Deford and Richville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
